document.full_text: the teammates of wouter weylandt crossed the finish line side by side and with arms linked at the giro d'italia on tuesday, honoring the cyclist who died in a crash a day earlier.
document.title: cyclists ride together on day of mourning at giro
lines_and_colors: the teammates of wouter weylandt crossed the finish line side by side and with arms linked at the giro d'italia on tuesday, honoring the cyclist who died in a crash a day earlier.
